redeployment.title: Redeployment
redeployment.description: Does this repository accept redeployment of the same artifact version.

preserveSnapshots.title: Preserved snapshots
preserveSnapshots.description: # By default Reposilite deletes all deprecated build files. If you'd like to preserve them, set this property to true.

quota.title: Quota
quota.description: Control the maximum amount of data stored in this repository. Supported formats: 90%, 500MB, 10GB (optional, by default: unlimited)

mount.title: Mount
mount.description: use custom directory to locate the repository data (optional, by default it's './repositories/{name}')

oneOf.title: File system Storage Provider
oneOf.description: Local file system (disk) storage provider settings

accessKey.title: Access Key
accessKey.description: overwrite AWS access-key used to authenticate (optional)

secretKey.title: Secret Key
secretKey.description: overwrite AWS secret-key used to authenticate (optional)

proxied.title: Proxied
proxied.description: List of proxied repositories associated with this repository.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: The reference to the proxied repository. Either the id of another local repository or the url of a remote repository.

store.title: Store
store.description: Reposilite can store proxied artifacts locally to reduce response time and improve stability.

connectTimeout.title: Connect Timeout
connectTimeout.description: How long Reposilite can wait for establishing the connection with a remote host.

readTimeout.title: Read Timeout
readTimeout.description: How long Reposilite can read data from remote proxy.

authorization.title: Authorisation
authorization.description: The authorisation information of the proxied repository.

allowedGroups.title: Allowed Groups
allowedGroups.description: Allowed artifact groups. If none are given, all artifacts can be obtained from this proxy.

items.title: Allowed Groups
items.description: Allowed artifact groups. If none are given, all artifacts can be obtained from this proxy.

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Custom proxy configuration for HTTP client used by Reposilite
